p: Post hoc comparisons using Tukeyâ€™s test indicated that the mean value of the group CHX-GIC (27.7) is statistically significantly the highest among the tested groups, followed by the mean value of the group 2:1 PE (25.6) which was statistically significantly higher than the mean values of the groups control, 1:2 PE and 1:1 PE (20.9, 21.5, and 21.6 respectively).
